informal_statement: Show that for positive integers $n$ and $k$, if $k \leq n$, then $\sum_{k=1}^n (k*C_n^k) = n * 2^{n-1}$.
formal_statement:
theorem numbertheory_sumkmulnckeqnmul2pownm1:
  fixes n k :: nat
  assumes h0 : "0<n \<and> 0<k"
    and h1 : "k\<le>n"
  shows "n choose k = ((n-1) choose k) + ((n-1) choose (k-1))"
